column2: df.musicFreq_binom <- df.raw_binom %>% select(Q2.3, grep("Q7.6", names(df.raw_binom))) %>% gather(statement, response, 2:8)
plot.musicFreq_yes_binom <- ggplot(df.musicFreq_binom %>% filter(Q2.3 == "Yes"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
plot.musicFreq_no_binom <- ggplot(df.musicFreq_binom %>% filter(Q2.3 == "No"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
ggarrange(plot.musicFreq_yes_binom, plot.musicFreq_no_binom, ncol = 2, common.legend = TRUE, legend = "right")
